item.title: PARKING BRAKE Lights – Park Brake Light – (Light INOP)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided EICAS Advisory message PARKING BRAKE is verified to be operative.

numlitem.para: When parking brake is set, verify EICAS Advisory message PARKING BRAKE is displayed.
Check that ANTI-SKID light (P5 panel) is extinguished.
If ANTI-SKID light is illuminated, dispatch must be with anti-skid inoperative then comply with MEL 32-42-1-0-1.

placard.para: Placard park brake light on control stand "Light INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
